mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.projectname AS "projectname", a.companyname AS "companyname", a.area AS "area", a.assessment AS "assessment", a.derate AS "derate", a.pay AS "pay", a.balancedue AS "balancedue", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tchecklist( id, projectname, companyname, area, assessment, derate, pay, balancedue, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{projectname}, #{companyname}, #{area}, #{assessment}, #{derate}, #{pay}, #{balancedue}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tchecklist SET projectname = #{projectname}, companyname = #{companyname}, area = #{area}, assessment = #{assessment}, derate = #{derate}, pay = #{pay}, balancedue = #{balancedue}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
